class.name: HashingContext
class.brief_description: Context to compute cryptographic hashes over multiple iterations.

method.name: finish
method.description: Closes the current context, and return the computed hash.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts a new hash computation of the given [code]type[/code] (e.g. [constant HASH_SHA256] to start computation of a SHA-256).

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the computation with the given [code]chunk[/code] of data.
